Level up {2}{U} [i]({2}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)[/i] [2/4]
[level 1-2] If a triggered ability of a permanent you control triggers, it triggers an additional time. [3/5]
[level 3+] If a triggered ability of a permanent you control triggers, it triggers an additional two times. [4/6]
